WorkItem.ClosedComment: not an issue, API has changed
WorkItem.Description:
I updated my MUI from 1.01 to 1.04 through NuGet, and now I'm getting a bunch of errors telling me:

```
'FirstFloor.ModernUI.Presentation.AppearanceManager' does not contain a definition for 'Theme'
```
or 'ThemeChanged'

and

```
An object reference is required for the non-static field, method or property 'FirstFloor.ModernUI.Presentation.AppearanceManager.FontSize.get'

An object reference is required for the non-static field, method or property 'FirstFloor.ModernUI.Presentation.AppearanceManager.AccentColor.get'
```
and other errors relating to the above.

I've tried removing the packaged and reinstalling with no luck. I will attempt to install the package from Codeplex next and report my findings.

Comments.Message: Not an error, it has changed. At first, the current instance of the AppearanceManager is referenced in the static property Current of the very calls. Then have a look at the demo program, Content/SettingsAppearanceViewModel.cs.
class not calls, sorry. (there is no edit function for issues)
